products.title: Serena Ecru Vertical Blind
products.description: With a wispy, tone on tone pattern of swirling stems and leaves, this lovely creamy serena vertical blind combines lightness and neutrality with delicate refinement. The creamy ecru colourway is warm yet neutral so you can use it to harmonise with a light and spacious room or, e with a wispy, tone on tone pattern of swirling stems and leaves, this lovely creamy serena vertical blind combines lightness and neutrality with delicate refinement.

products.title: Ecru Aluminium Venetian
products.description: Aluminium venetian blinds are perfect for controlling the light coming into your home, along with adding privacy and a stylish finish to your window. In a range of colours, these blinds are perfect for any decor. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Galaxy Asc Blackout Ecru Perfect Fit
products.description: Part of their galaxy blackout range, where advanced solar control (asc) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.

products.title: Sunwood Gloss Creme With Ecru Tapes Venetian Blind

products.title: Pure White & Ecru Wooden Blind With Tapes - 35mm Slat
products.description: Offering striking contrast against the pure white painted wooden slat the ecru tape is softly coloured in a neutral and wonderfully contemporary tone. Just lovely, this wooden blind offers a nice bright look thats tempered ever so slightly by the warmer coloured tape. Decora offering striking contrast against the pure white painted wooden slat the ecru tape is softly coloured in a neutral and wonderfully contemporary tone.

products.title: Shine, Ecru - Day Night Blind
products.description: The shimmering golden cream of the shine in ecru gives a sense of understated glamour, providing plenty of character without overwhelming colour. The shade works wonderfully with the soft sheerness of the slidable strips, which work to afford you light and privacy simultaneously. The ecru will temper bolder colours easily, without taking away from its own unique look. For an elegant feel in the master bedroom, sit the blind against an aubergine feature wall, and accent throughout with similar tones of cream and purple, using gold as a subtle trim.

products.title: Capri, Ecru - Roman Blind
products.description: A multi-coloured delight, the capri ecru depicts gorgeous foliage in artistic brushstrokes of icy blues, aqua greens, sunny yellows, and more. This roman blind is both pretty and refreshing, perfect for both contemporary and traditional homes. Use the ecru to add a splash or two of colour to your home office, without the distraction of anything too bold or flashy. Settle amongst white or pale grey walls and keep the furniture clean and modern, with the occasional colourful accessory for good measure.
